cycles.problem: A while loop carries on as long as...
cycles.answer1: The condition in the brackets is true
cycles.answer3: The condition in the brackets is false
cycles.answer4: the for loop has not ended
cycles.correct: The condition in the brackets is true

cycles.problem: A while loop has the following format:
Which loop loops a set number of times?
Which of the following is a type of loop in Java?
